title: After the Flash Marriage, I Was in the Hands of the Big Man
overview: Song Cha fell in love with Wan Ni at first sight, and snatched Wan Ni and Hu En's bride on their wedding day, and forcefully married Wan Ni.After the marriage, Song Cha protected his wife domineeringly, and Wan Ni was gradually moved by Song Cha.When Hu En learned that Wan Ni had changed her mind, he felt jealous and accidentally killed Wan Ni's father and framed the blame on Song Cha.The three of them faced off in an abandoned factory. Hu En wanted to kill the two of them, but Song Cha counterattacked.In the end, the police arrived and punished Hu En. Song Cha got his wish after pursuing his wife, but he was also punished for the crime he committed.
